::Aerotaur::
      "You said Perplex baught it?  He doesnt seem totally irrational maybe 
there's something he isn't telling us about this ship."  He walks through the 
shp until he comes to the medical lab.  "Hey, Perplex.  Is there something 
useful about this ship anything that can be used to defend it?  Something you 
haven't told anyone else?"
